name: end_time
description: Simulation duration. If no unit is specified defaults to hour.
units: s, sec, h, hr, d, day

name: soil_params.quartz
description: soil quartz content, used in soil thermal conductivity function of Peters-Lidard

name: ice_fraction_scheme
description: runoff scheme used in the soil reservoir models (e.g. CFE), options: Schaake and Xinanjiang

name: soil_z
description: vertical resolution of the soil column (computational domain of the SFT model)

name: soil_temperature
description: initial soil temperature for the discretized column

name: soil_moisture_content
description: initial soil total (liquid + ice) moisture content for the discretized column

name: soil_liquid_content
description: initial soil liquid moisture content for the discretized column

name: bottom_boundary_temp
description: temperature at the bottom boundary (BC) of the domain, if not specified, the default BC is zero-geothermal flux

name: top_boundary_temp
description: temperature at the top/surface boundary of the domain, if not specified, then other options include: 1) read from a file, or 2) provided through coupling

name: sft_standalone
description: true for standalone model run; default is false

name: soil_moisture_bmi
description: If true soil_moisture_profile is set by the SoilMoistureProfile module through the BMI; if false then config file must provide soil_moisture_content and soil_liquid_content

name: dt
description: Size of a simulation timestep. If no unit is specified defaults to hour.
units: s, sec, h, hr, d, day
